levels.description: Attacks hit up to 3 targets simultaneously; chance for Talent 1 to trigger increases to <@ba.vup>{talent@prob:0%}</>, attacks strike twice; if the target is above <@ba.vup>{attack@hp_ratio:0%}</> HP, deals 1 additional hit
